page.title: 17Springfield Farming
page.content: The{farmer}buys in 200-250 calves and keeps them up to 3 months old.He gets them mainly from the S.W. of England and south of Scotland.He keeps Aberdeen Angus,Simmental,Friesian and Hereford.The 8 fields of the farm are approximately 30 acres and he gets the fields sprayed. One of his tractors would cost from Â£7000-Â£10000. He has 2 Massey Ferguson tractors. The farm was built in 1950 and a farmer's life is a difficult one. The busiest time of year is Summer when he makes 4500 straw bales.He rears chickens and gets up to 200,000 chickens a year.
